pullRequest.title: CorfuStoreBrowser: fix RegistryTable printTable bug
pullRequest.bodyText:
RegistryTable is a system table that does not need the
DynamicProtobufSerializer, so the printTable must handle
this differently otherwiser it will hit this exception
java.lang.ClassCastException:
org.corfudb.runtime.CorfuStoreMetadata$TableName cannot be cast to
org.corfudb.runtime.collections.CorfuDynamicKey
Related issue(s) (if applicable): #2378
Checklist (Definition of Done):

 There are no TODOs left in the code
 Coding conventions (e.g. for logging, unit tests) have been followed
 Change is covered by automated tests
 Public API has Javadoc

commit.message:
CorfuStoreBrowser: fix RegistryTable printTable bug

RegistryTable is a system table that does not need the
DynamicProtobufSerializer, so the printTable must handle
this differently otherwiser it will hit this exception
ava.lang.ClassCastException:
org.corfudb.runtime.CorfuStoreMetadata$TableName cannot be cast to
org.corfudb.runtime.collections.CorfuDynamicKey
CorfuStore: Fix corfu_options error in DynamicProtobufSerializer

nodes.bodyText: maybe add a todo to find the real issue for the truncation?

we're doing the same thing in the compactor, can the same issue happen there (We first do a runtime.getTableRegistry there, and then again open it with the dynamic serializer)? Because then we can work around it for now, until the scoping fix is in.
